forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers during the morning will give way to a steadier rain this afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers during the morning will give way to a steadier rain this afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low near 55F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening with clear skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clear overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 41F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 54F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 43F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny in the morning. Increasing clouds with showers later in the day. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. High near 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.
